title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, April 19, 2022
description: "There are no good girls gone wrong, just bad girls found out."—author and Actress Mae West, who was jailed on this day in 1927 for her performance in “Sex” on broadway.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "There are no good girls gone wrong, just bad girls found out."—author and Actress Mae West, who was jailed on this day in 1927 for her performance in “Sex” on broadway.
